name: SLS Seattle
description:
Finding an ideal luxury hotel in Seattle does not have to be difficult. Welcome to SLS Seattle, a nice option for travelers like you.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Seattle, SLS Seattle is located a short distance from Columbia Center (0.1 mi) and Smith Tower (0.2 mi).
Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning.
While in Seattle be sure to experience local chicken and waffles favorites at Skillet, Smith, or Local 360.
During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Sky View Observatory (0.1 mi) and The Gum Wall (0.5 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.
SLS Seattle looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Seattle.
